title: Bug 6125 - JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing 'Finish' in the JAR packager, the following error occurs: 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'
OB: When attempting to create a JAR with unsaved editors, the packager fails to create the JAR and displays an error message stating 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'
EB: I expect to be able to create a JAR with unsaved editors. If the editors are unsaved, a dialog should prompt me to save them before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the JAR packager wizard
2. Ensure there are unsaved editors open
3. Enter all the necessary fields in the wizard
4. Click on 'Finish' button
